data.feedback: The planning comprehensively covers all 9 user requirements with proper 1:1 epic mapping. Architecture follows Flutter best practices with clean architecture, correct package choices, and proper backend API alignment. Minor cosmetic issues in dependency arrays don't affect implementation.

issues.description: Duplicate entries in some dependency arrays (cosmetic)
issues.recommendation: Remove duplicate epic IDs from dependencies arrays

issues.description: executionOrder values have inconsistencies (e.g., multiple epics with order 1 or 2)
issues.recommendation: Actual dependencies are correct, execution order is informational only

suggestions: Consider adding api_response_model.dart to standardize API response parsing
Add a settings_screen.dart under epic-auth-ui or epic-native-integration for user preferences
